availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Owen W. Ballew (First lieutenant and captain in the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regimenty Cavalry.)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Kitty McHenry Ballew in Madison County on March 6, 1856. Resident in Madison County in 1860. First lieutenant and captain in the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from January 17, 1863, to December 23, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 148-49.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Division 1, p. 80.
Find A Grave, "Owen Walker Ballew (October 17, 1834-June 18, 1920)," Memorial #48885816, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/48885816 (accessed November 2, 2018).
